She Was Missing a Chunk of Her Brain. It Didn’t Matter

stories.text:
Hi, everyone!

I am delighted to launch useaffiliates.com into the wild!

I always wanted to build something in public and chose a project idea that I believe fits with my mantra of "provide value."

If you are a creator, hopefully, you'll find exciting monetization opportunities via one of the affiliate programs in my database. It doesn't matter if you are a big or small content creator. Many affiliate programs listed in the database are already happy if you can provide them with one new customer.

And if you have an affiliate program, consider posting your program to useaffiliates.com to get your product featured in more blogs, videos, or podcasts. Don't underestimate how many new customers you can gain who are currently reading a blog by an author with only 100 subscribers.

Especially if you have a niche product or service, getting your affiliate marketing in front of creators willing to share your product is invaluable!

If you want to read the entire journey of building this project, please check out the whole series here;

https://dev.to/twankrui/building-a-business-from-scratch-in-...

Hopefully, I can inspire one of you also to start building in building and provide value to new and seasoned creators!
